description: This file defines API routes for managing and accessing 'Content' entities in a FastAPI application, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting content. It distinguishes between public and admin functionality.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router instance for grouping content-related endpoints

classes.name: Content
classes.description: Data model representing content in the database

classes.name: User
classes.description: User model used for authentication and authorization

methods.name: list_content( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search text in title/description"), genre: Optional[str] = None, language: Optional[str] = None, release_year: Optional[int] = None, category: Optional[str] = None, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Fetches a list of content items with optional search and filter parameters.

methods.name: get_content(content_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Retrieves content details by the specified ID.

methods.name: admin_create_content( payload: ContentCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Allows an admin user to create new content.

methods.name: admin_update_content( content_id: int, payload: ContentUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Allows an admin user to update existing content by ID.

methods.name: admin_delete_content( content_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
methods.description: Allows an admin user to delete content by ID.

ctags.name: admin_create_content
ctags.signature: ( payload: ContentCreate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: admin_delete_content
ctags.signature: ( content_id: int, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: admin_update_content
ctags.signature: ( content_id: int, payload: ContentUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db), )

ctags.name: list_content
ctags.signature: ( q: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Search text in title/description"), genre: Optional[str] = None, language: Optional[str] = None, release_year: Optional[int] = None, category: Optional[str] = None, db: Session = Depends(get_db), )
